{"id":1261762862,"question_id":3429,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1716086776,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1261762862/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Special Array I","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isArraySpecial(int[] nums) {\n        if(nums.length==1)\n            return true;\n        int parity = (nums[0]&1);\n        \n        for(int i=1;i<nums.length;i++){\n            if((parity^(nums[i]&1)) == 0)\n                return false;\n            parity = (nums[i]&1);\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"special-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
